senses.gloss: Based on or in accordance with reason or logic.
senses.example: She made a rational decision after weighing all options.

senses.gloss: To respond to a gesture or action by making a corresponding one.
senses.example: She smiled at him, and he reciprocated warmly.

senses.gloss: Closely connected or appropriate to what is being done or considered.
senses.example: Please include only relevant information in your report.

senses.gloss: Able to withstand or recover quickly from difficult conditions.
senses.example: The community proved resilient in the face of adversity.

senses.gloss: To bring back to a former condition, place, or position.
senses.example: Workers are restoring the historic building.
